name: Day to Day and Bea
description:
Have you ever been stuck in a rut?

Lately, Risuna has too. But with the help of someone she met online and a new friend, the situation isn't hopeless. Join her as she opens her eyes to new possibilities in life!

This is a short (...maybe not that short) fangame made for the VTuber Beatani and her community. If you don't know who that is, consider checking her out!

We hope you enjoy it! 


Controls: 

  • Movement -> Arrow keys
  • Action -> Z key
  • Cancel -> ESC or X key
  • Sprint -> SHIFT key
  • Fullscreen -> F4

...Simple, right?

Saving the game:

Press Cancel and select the 'Save' option. Please note that you can't save the game during the Visual Novel segments (...sorry!).

Length:

1 hour or so, probably more if you take your time exploring a bit. (If you read all the written lines out loud maybe 3 hours)
